title: InvoiceMethodLTD
author: InvoiceMethodLTD
content: Dan here, offering a unique service which you don't want to miss out on.  If you are an agency/ media buyer or super affiliate then this service is for you. Contact on Telegram for further info: https://t.me/Danbizagency@DanbizagencyAbout the invoicing serviceWe offer an invoicing service upto $100,000 guaranteed approval for your Microsoft/ Bing ads account. When we have invoiced you're account, you will be able to spend upto the limit. If you buy $50,000 invoice limit, you can spend that on you're own campaigns. We guarantee you spend upto 70% on Blackhat campaigns and 85% on whitehat campaigns. If you do not reach this target we will happily replace the invoice for you on a different account. Feel free to reach out on Telegram if you have any further questions. Please use the Telegram link to make sure you contact the correct person. Telegram contact: https://t.me/Danbizagency@DanbizagencyAll sales are final but will give a replacement. Invoicing of you're own account takes roughly 30 minutes but please allow up to an hour. Thank you.
